title: seeking bi sub female for ltfwb
text:
Let me start simple, I am in a relationship with a man I love very much. Not interested in swingers or introducing another male, however the ideal person I am looking for would have a partner (male or female) to meet their romantic/ emotional needs. Not looking for a one night stand or a short lived fantasy. Now that the shallow part is out of the way, here's what I am looking for...

My bf is very dominate (more of the "do as I say" Dom than the gonna whoop ya Dom), and I am a switch - not a very submissive one, and I don't want to see him bow to me. We need an outlet for things we cannot seek in each other.

Ideally, a woman with a brain that I can talk to/hang out with that has a pervy side and a need to let go/be controlled once in a while would be fantastic. Perhaps something your current relationship cannot offer.

No luck on dating sites (mostly girls who hate couples) and fet sites aren't much better (I don't want someone who wants to suck on a binkie or completely brain dead). He's completely phobic of CL, but I've had phenomenal luck in the past! 

So what happens next? If you're interested, shoot me an email with a face pic and tell me about yourself (what you do, your relationship status, immediate goals) and I'll respond in kind. Not looking to rush things, I don't want to run through a slew of girls trying to find "the right one". I'd rather get to know you, see if we're all compatible before getting to far. 

A little more about us: He's 29, I'm 31. We're both drug and disease free. We're more-or-less home and gym bodies/work-a-holics. We don't go out and party, but we enjoy a nice relaxing time. 

As lovely as you trans-gendered ladies are, we will have to respectfully decline those offers. Not really into male submissives either guys (I know there's plenty women who'd love to meet you though! Lol)

Hope to hear from my dream girl soon!

title: Seeking something simple......
text:
Complexities are irreverent. Most of us do not have the ability to foresee the future. If I come out and say I am seeking FWB, what is you immediate response? SEX!?
First, I am looking for someone who enjoys laughing, hangin out, chatting about all kinds of things, nothing extreme. I am not looking to travel every weekend to some......place to distract me from the mundane. I am a very happy person, very content with what life is. I am looking for someone special whom I may have a connection with, and if there is chemistry, yay for us.
Age, race, and religion does not contribute to any of my decisions. I will not jog nor workout with you. You have your things, I have mine. I am not a 7/24 kinda gal, but when I am with you my attention is on you. I am not a marathon texter, I would rather speak. I am not a sugar momma. I am a lesbian, so I have no interest in your man or if you are with a man. I also have a large amount of self respect, so if you are addicted to your phone or if you are aloof or all hopped up on pretense I am not interested. 
So, if you like to cuddle, discuss interesting topics, chill on the couch with a movie, cooking up experiments in the kitchen, enjoy nice dinners out, go to junk sales, garden, go to small play houses and theatres, take a walk thru the park, listen to music.............Then let me know. Oh, and I am nearing 49 in age.
